review: I have two older Roku devices that I love. But after discovering that the Fire TV Stick could operate KODI, I bought the stick when it was on sale. This sucker is FAST! You can zip through all the channels and have a movie or tv show playing in no-time! I installed Kodi and have been on a movie watching binge...I cannot get enough of this thing. Best money I ever spent for entertainment...I totally recommend!UPDATE 8/24/2015: Still loving my Fire Stick-just bought another one! Get yur Kodi on!

author: Amazon Customer

review: Oh Amazon fire stick...where have you been all of my life?! This product was a replacement for my Logitech system (you know, the whole wireless keyboard system hooked up to your tv and another receiver that had to be used with it to work...all while collecting even more dust...yeah, that one). Anyway...this fire stick could not be easier to:1. Set up.2. Find shows.3. Forget you even have TV and binge watch OITNB and other Netflix and Hulu and SURPRISE....Amazon prime movies/shows!I love how simple this is and the setup animation was cute and simple and to the point. Highly recommend this affordable option for streaming shows and movies. I may even cancel my cable service and just keep Internet!
author: Stephanie Schaefer

review: Doesn't work to mirror iPhone or iPad.  That was the whole purpose of the purchase.  Very misleading to say "Fire TV Stick lets you mirror your phone or tablet to your TV, or fling favorite apps to free up your small screen for other uses" when it only works with Fire phones/tablets and some Androids.
